scal_times : forall (k : nat) (x y : X), scal k (x ⊗ y) = x ⊗ scal k y
monoid_assoc : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z
scal_one_comm : forall (k : nat) (x : X), scal k o ⊗ x = x ⊗ scal k o
times_zero_r : forall x : X, x ⊗ z = z
times_zero_l : forall x : X, z ⊗ x = z
mscal_comm : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (x y : X), m x y = m y x -> m (mscal m u n x) y = m y (mscal m u n x)
mscal_sum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (x y : X), m x y = m y x -> mscal m u n (m x y) = m (mscal m u n x) (mscal m u n y)
measure_rect : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> nat) (P : X -> Type), (forall x : X, (forall y : X, m y < m x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : X, P x
monoid_unit_l : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m u x = x
monoid_unit_r : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m x u = x
Nat.divmod_spec : forall x y q u : nat, u <= y -> let (q', u') := Nat.divmod x y q u in x + S y * q + (y - u) = S y * q' + (y - u') /\ u' <= y
mscal_1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, mscal m u 1 x = x
Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.div_mod : forall x y : nat, y <> 0 -> x = y * (x / y) + x mod y
gcd.cmp_sub : forall x y : nat, {z : nat | z + y = x} + {x < y}
msum_morph : forall (X Y : Type) (m1 : X -> X -> X) (u1 : X) (m2 : Y -> Y -> Y) (u2 : Y) (phi : X -> Y), phi u1 = u2 -> (forall x y : X, phi (m1 x y) = m2 (phi x) (phi y)) -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), phi (msum m1 u1 n f) = msum m2 u2 n (fun x : nat => phi (f x))
mscal_morph : forall (X Y : Type) (m1 : X -> X -> X) (u1 : X) (m2 : Y -> Y -> Y) (u2 : Y) (phi : X -> Y), phi u1 = u2 -> (forall x y : X, phi (m1 x y) = m2 (phi x) (phi y)) -> forall (n : nat) (x : X), phi (mscal m1 u1 n x) = mscal m2 u2 n (phi x)
mscal_plus1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (x : X), mscal m u (S n) x = m (mscal m u n x) x
mscal_0 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u x : X), mscal m u 0 x = u
